Description: Fragment of oval handle of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora, gradual curve. Clay medium red-brown. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Petrie Diary (EES Archive XVII 47) contains several such drawings. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0337.21.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0500)
